Name: proc badssl {url} {set port 443;lassign [split $url ":"] url port;if {$port eq ""} {set port 443};set cmd [list tls::socket -autoservername 1 -require 1];if {[info exists ::env(SSL_CERT_FILE)]} {lappend cmd -cafile $::env(SSL_CERT_FILE)};lappend cmd $url $port;set ch [eval $cmd];if {[catch {tls::handshake $ch} err]} {close $ch;return -code error $err} else {close $ch}}
